Reviews.Title: You cant go wrong for the money.
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: 560 TV Line Metal Indoor / Outdoor basic camera. It is what it is. Got it in 2 days put it it up over the weekend.. BAMMM.. Good Deal for the $$$$$$$

Reviews.Title: Great unit
Reviews.Author: W. J. ASH
Reviews.Content: I use it with my home security DVR.  Excellent color, resolution and night vision.  I have it mounted on the ceiling in the corner of the living room, views the whole room (3.6 mm lens).  It blends right in and no wires show.

ProductInfo.Features:
1/3-Inch Sony CCD
560 TV lines
Super low lux 0 Lux minimum illumination
ProductInfo.Name: GW Security GW736W 1/3-Inch Sony CCD 560 TV Lines, 3.6mm Wide Angle Lens, 24pcs IR LED Indoor Dome Security Camera
